nodes.text: Axis was an Anomid male who served as a supporter to the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. He infiltrated the Hutt Data Center of HoloNet on Nar Shaddaa in order to gain access to its information. He attempted to formally offer his services to the Empire, but was killed by Imperial-affiliated spacers.
Axis is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Kiff VandenHeuvel.
